----------------- 1.Description -----------------
The Tusk is a semi Feral sociopath who lives for pride and boasting after all that was left to her was the satisfaction procured by vengeance. She didn't come here for redemption or salvation, she only followed her next big prize's trail to fill a wall of vanity.
Like the Bounty Hunter, the Tusk is a CC/Offense hybrid with high damage potential but limited mobility, although her kit offers a different specialization.
